body:
Head is using k8s.gcr.io:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/90f681be107cf67aa610b836a6a45f99e0bf04f2/cluster/addons/dns/coredns/coredns.yaml.in#L109

It would be great if you could also update the 1.10 and 1.9 release branches to do the same so we can vulnerability scan those images.

```
gcastle@jnt:~/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes$ git checkout --quiet upstream/release-1.10
gcastle@jnt:~/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes$ g coredns/coredns
cluster/addons/dns/coredns.yaml.sed:        image: coredns/coredns:1.0.6
cluster/addons/dns/coredns.yaml.in:        image: coredns/coredns:1.0.6
cluster/addons/dns/coredns.yaml.base:        image: coredns/coredns:1.0.6
cmd/kubeadm/app/phases/addons/dns/manifests.go:        image: coredns/coredns:{{ .Version }}
gcastle@jnt:~/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes$ git checkout --quiet upstream/release-1.9
gcastle@jnt:~/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes$ g coredns/coredns
cluster/addons/dns/coredns.yaml.sed:        image: coredns/coredns:1.0.1
cluster/addons/dns/coredns.yaml.in:        image: coredns/coredns:1.0.1
cluster/addons/dns/coredns.yaml.base:        image: coredns/coredns:1.0.1
cmd/kubeadm/app/phases/addons/dns/manifests.go:        image: coredns/coredns:{{ .Version }}
```
/kind bug
/sig auth

@rajansandeep

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Network.
labels.name: sig/network

title: Move coredns/coredns to k8s.gcr.io for 1.10 and 1.9
